long_description: Keep your shampoo, makeup and other personal items organized in the attractive Sherpani Passage Toiletry Bag, with its water-resistant embroidered exterior. Durable ripstop nylon is silicone-treated to resist moisture. Zippered main compartment features a mesh divider. Two inner see-through pockets zip up small items. Sherpani Passage Toiletry Bag matches some Sherpani luggage, sold separately.
short_description: Keep your shampoo, makeup and other personal items organized in the attractive Sherpani Passage Toiletry Bag, with its water-resistant embroidered exterior.
